structure.unit: RAILROAD COMMISSION -- RATES AND SERVICE OF COMMON CARRIERS

law.history: Repealed 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 417, sec. 17, effective December 1, 2000. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 201e-14, 201e-22, 820a-1.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Hearings and orders as to extortion.
metadata.lrc-note: (12/1/2000). The contingency on the effectiveness of the repeal of this statute set by 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 417, sec. 18, was met, the voters of the Commonwealth having ratified at the general election on November 7, 2000, a constitutional amendment (see 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 399) abolishing the Railroad Commission.
